Appendix A

Electronic Components

  • NVIDIA Jetson Orin Nano Super Developer Kit (1x)

  • NEO-M8P-2 (1x)

  • ZED-F9P-02B (1x)

  • LV-MaxSonar-EZ Series High Performance Sonar Range Finder (3x)

  • XIITIA HC-12 433MHz SI4463/SI4468 Wireless Serial Port Module (4x)

  • RPLIDAR A1M8 (1x)

  • Arduino Nano (1x)

Power Supply Components

  • ZEE 11.1V 80C 3S 6000mAh Battery (2x)

  • MOFEEZ Power Distribution Bus Bar (2x)

  • iRhapsody 40/30A 12VDC 5-Pin SPDT Automotive Relay (5x)

  • VOLRANTISE DC 12V/24V to 5V 10A Converter (1x)

  • Adafruit MAX17048 LiPoly / LiIon Fuel Gauge and Battery Monitor (2x)

  • 12 AWG Electrical Wire Cable - Red/Black (50 ft. ea.)

  • 18 AWG Electrical Wire Cable - Red/Black (100 ft. ea.)

  • 22 AWG Stranded Tinned Copper Wire - 10 Color Silicone Wire Kit (25 ft. ea.)

Drive System Components

  • INJORA Hobbywing QUICRUN 1060 60A Waterproof Brushed ESC Speed Controller with 6V/3A BEC for 1/10 RC Car (1x)

  • INJORA 550 3-SLOT Waterproof Brushed Motor 12T 21T 29T 35T 55T for 1/10 RC Crawler (1x)

  • INJORA INJS235 35KG Waterproof Brushless Servo Large Torque Digital Servo (1x)
